page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = SetOptions(Options as C)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Options
argument.description: Options may include any combination of the following.

page.description: Set one or more options in a single call:
page.discussion: The INET::Socket::SetOptions() method sets one or more options in a single call.
